Package logic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Dart
    The Class Dart - contains specific methods to deal with the darts in the game.
    Dragon
    The Class Dragon - contains specific methods to deal with the dragons in the game.
    Element
    The Class Element - contains the state and position of a given game element, as well as methods that are common to all game elements.
    Exit
    The Class Exit - contains specific methods to deal with the exit of the game board.
    Game
    The Class Game - contains all the game elements, as well as the board the game mecanics.
    Hero
    The Class Hero - contains specific methods to deal with the Hero of the game.
    Maze
    The Class Maze - constains the game board.
    Maze_Builder
    The Class Maze_Builder is used to build the game board.
    Move_Dragon
    The Class Move_Dragon is used to move the dragons in the game board.
    Move_Hero
    The Class Move_Hero is used to move the hero in the game board.
    Random_Exit
    The Class Random_Exit is used to randomly generate a board exit for the game.
    Random_Maze
    The Class Random_Maze is used to generate a random maze for the game.
    Shield
    The Class Shield - contains specific methods to deal with the shield of the game.
    Static_Maze
    The Class Static_Maze is used to generate a random maze for the game.
    Sword
    The Class Sword - contains specific methods to deal with the sword of the game.
    Throw_Dart
    The Class Throw_Dart is used when the hero throws a dart.
